content.prompt: Ikenga figures, created by the Igbo peoples of Nigeria, are being interpreted as

choices.label: portraits of the people for whom they are carved
reliquaries for the bones of the patron after death
symbols of the patron’s past and future successes
representations of the patron’s hoped-for children

topic.text: 6.3: Theories and Interpretations of African Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
